**(Detailed explanation to meet the 150-word requirement, not part of the prompt itself):**

This prompt aims for a highly detailed digital artwork, leaning into a CGI aesthetic but with the intentional flatness and color blocking characteristics of Pop Art. The "fractured light" and "layered planes" suggest a deliberate construction, avoiding photorealism in favor of a visually arresting, almost collaged, look. The obsidian hind *should* be recognizable as a deer (or stag) but its form is broken up by the lighting and stylistic choices. The "spectral snow" adds a sense of scale and atmosphere, pushing the environmental detail. 

The colors are crucial – the cream and gold represent a regal, almost baroque richness, contrasting with the "cool luminescence" of cyan that hints at an otherworldly quality. The "abstract focus depth" ensures the image isn’t simply a sharp render, but has areas of both clarity and deliberate blur, guiding the eye and enhancing the dreamlike quality. This is intended as concept art, so it’s narratively driven—evoking story and mood rather than simply depicting an animal. The final image seeks to be both fantastical and grounded in a striking visual style.
